snippet: While indefensibly late, the move is welcome if it triggers debate about the goals and scope of the military intervention.
abstract: Editorial welcomes Pres Obama's request, albeit late, to Congress to authorize war against Islamic State, if it starts debate about scope, goals and justification of the military action; holds Congress, putting together new war authorization, should ruminate on missteps and unintended results of past efforts to fight Sunni insurgent groups in Middle East and Africa.
lead_paragraph: While indefensibly late, the move is welcome if it triggers debate about the goals and scope of the military intervention.

headline.print_headline: Seeking Authority to Conduct a War
headline.main: Obama Seeks an Expansive War Authorization to Combat ISIS

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
